course_title: Freshmen Seminar: Film Media: Black Mirror
class_notes: This freshman seminar will explore the Channel 4/Netflix science-fiction anthology series 多Black Mirror多 in relation to theories and histories of digital media technologies. We will also be participating in the Student Flourishing Initiative, in which student well-being is made central to the course and part of its content. We will explore the theme of 多Flourishing Through Dystopia?多 and ask whether and how individual and collective well-being are possible in a time period of rapid technological, cultural, and ecological shifts.
course_description: Explores various topics in Film and Media.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3116, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: T. Allison, Status: Closed
